subject: Sexual Health
title: Vasectomy
description: A fast breakdown of Vasectomy for builders.

hook.text: A 15-minute outpatient procedure can permanently prevent pregnancy in men with over 99% effectiveness.

buildup.text: Vasectomy cuts or seals the vas deferens, blocking sperm from reaching the semen during ejaculation.

discovery.text: The procedure does not affect hormone levels, sex drive, or the ability to ejaculate normally.

twist.text: Reversal is possible but not guaranteed. Success rates drop significantly the longer a man waits.

climax.text: Vasectomy is the most effective and least invasive permanent contraceptive option available today.

punchline.text: Fifteen minutes for a lifetime of prevention.

quiz.question: Does vasectomy affect testosterone or sex drive?
options: No, hormones and sex drive are unaffected
